title: Ahri Nendoroid
body:
Any update on when the Soon™ actually becomes It's Out™?
The figure been lost in soon™ limbo for at least 6 months now.
https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/collectibles/figures/nendoroid-ahri.html

replies.body: Same thing with that Ahri statue. They said they'd be bringing it back "later this year", but they're running out of time for that.
We don't have any exact dates on when any of that merch will be coming back. Your best bet is to check the status as you have been and also check out the news page for upcoming details.
